dishes.name: neapolitan style pizza
dishes.description: A basic dough, raw tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and olive oil.

dishes.name: pad thai
dishes.description: A traditional Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, beansprouts, and a multitude of spices.

dishes.name: street tacos
dishes.description: corn tortilla filled with meat, onion, cilantro, and salsa.

dishes.name: lemon butter salmon
dishes.description: salmon baked with lemon butter and different spices.

dishes.name: philly cheese steak
dishes.description: A sandwich made of thinly sliced beef cooked on a griddle and served on a sliced roll with cheese, onions, and peppers.
